title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Advanced Communication Skills Enhancement Course in Phlebotomy Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic phlebotomy procedures, understanding of medical environments, and intermediate patient interaction experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply three appropriate communication strategies through role-playing with patients of varying dispositions (cooperative/resistant).
Learners can propose solutions for five potential conflict scenarios during blood collection (e.g., patients with needle phobia).
Learners can achieve at least 80% proficiency in communication skills performance through peer assessment after offline practical training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
